body_html: believe you me, this is a Quick fix (not the capital Q ;) ), and the supervisor's dashboard needs an overhaul anyway. This fix is just a stopgap, so feel free to chuck it out when you get to the dashboard. It's just so it's not so annoying right now @F3PiX
